thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: My family members have been doing this for years and have had the most amazing experiences in the most beautiful places around this great big planet. I joined last year and have had equally fabulous and life changing experiences. Short or long stay, if you are looking for a way to meet new people, love new animal friends and take adventures of a lifetime, this is your ticket
